newsitem.title: USA: Premenos at all-time low after EPS warning.
newsitem.headline: Premenos at all-time low after EPS warning.

text.p: The bottom fell out of Premenos Technology Corp stock in the first minutes of Nasdaq trade Tuesday as investors fled after the company announced a quarterly loss and the resignation of a top executive.

The market value of Premenos shares declined almost 55 percent, or 9-1/8 points, to 7-1/2, in trade so vigorous the volume in the first half hour of the Nasdaq session -- more than 600,000 shares -- was 10 times the average daily volume.
"That is exactly correct," responded a Premonos market maker, when asked if the share decline was related to the earnings and executive departure.
